verses.verse: The beginning <S%G746><s%> of the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> face, <S%G4383><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will prepare <S%G2680><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you. <S%G4675><s%>

The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Make ready the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight! <S%G2117><s%>'"

<S%G2491><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of Judea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all those of Jerusalem <S%G2415><s%> went out <S%G1607><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G907><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> river, <S%G4215><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> clothed with <S%G1746><s%> camel <S%G2574><s%>'s hair <S%G2359><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> a leather <S%G1193><s%> belt <S%G2223><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> waist. <S%G3751><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He ate <S%G2068><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey. <S%G3192><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He preached, <S%G2784><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "After <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> he who is mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I, <S%G3450><s%> the thong <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> sandals <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to <S%G3089><s%> stoop down <S%G2955><s%> and loosen. <S%G3089><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G99999><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> will baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> It happened <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the water, <S%G5204><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> parting, <S%G4977><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove. <S%G4058><s%>

A <S%G2532><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the sky, <S%G3772><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I am well pleased. <S%G2106><s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> drove <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the wild animals; <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> were serving <S%G1247><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was taken into custody, <S%G3860><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at hand! <S%G1448><s%> Repent, <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in the Good News. <S%G1722><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Passing <S%G4043><s%> along by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> the <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of Simon casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> fishermen. <S%G231><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Come <S%G1205><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G1205><s%> into <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> for men. <S%G444><s%>"
Immediately <S%G2112><s%> they left <S%G863><s%> their <S%G846><s%> nets, <S%G1350><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Going <S%G4260><s%> on a little further <S%G3641><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> who <S%G846><s%> were <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> the nets. <S%G1350><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they left <S%G863><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the hired servants, <S%G3411><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They went <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> on the Sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and taught. <S%G1321><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2258><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G2258><s%> them <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the scribes. <S%G1122><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately there was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogue <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he cried out, <S%G349><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Ha! <S%G1436><s%> What do we have <S%G5101><s%> to do <S%G2254><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> you Nazarene? <S%G3479><s%> Have you come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> you are: <S%G1488><s%> the Holy One <S%G40><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Be quiet, <S%G5392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G4682><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> convulsing <S%G4682><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> came out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They were <S%G2284><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G2284><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> they questioned <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this? <S%G5124><s%> A <S%G5101><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> teaching? <S%G1322><s%> <S%G3778><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> he commands <S%G2004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they obey <S%G5219><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> The report <S%G189><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> everywhere <S%G1519><s%> into all <S%G3650><s%> the region of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> and its surrounding area. <S%G4066><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> when they had come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s wife <S%G3994><s%>'s mother lay <S%G2621><s%> sick with a fever, <S%G4445><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> they told <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He came <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G2902><s%> her <S%G846><s%> by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and raised <S%G1453><s%> her <S%G846><s%> up. <S%G1453><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112><s%> The fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she served <S%G1247><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> At evening, <S%G3798><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> had <S%G1096><s%> set, <S%G1416><s%> they brought <S%G5342><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who were <S%G2192><s%> sick, <S%G2560><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were possessed by demons. <S%G1139><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> gathered together <S%G1996><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door. <S%G2374><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> who were <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%> with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases, <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> demons. <S%G1140><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He didn't <S%G3756><s%> allow <S%G863><s%> the demons <S%G1140><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Early in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> while <S%G3029><s%> it was still dark, <S%G1773><s%> he rose up <S%G450><s%> and went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a deserted <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> there. <S%G2546><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who were <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> followed after <S%G2614><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Everyone <S%G3956><s%> is looking for <S%G2212><s%> you. <S%G3754><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Let <S%G71><s%>'s go elsewhere into <S%G1519><s%> the next <S%G2192><s%> towns, <S%G2969><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there also, <S%G2546><s%> because I came out <S%G1831><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this reason. <S%G5124><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2258><s%> went into <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> casting out <S%G1544><s%> demons. <S%G1140><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> A leper <S%G3015><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> begging <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> kneeling down <S%G1120><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> you want <S%G2309><s%> to, <S%G1410><s%> you can make me <S%G3165><s%> clean. <S%G3754><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Being moved with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> he stretched out <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "I want <S%G2309><s%> to. <S%G2511><s%> Be made clean."

<S%G2532><s%> When he <S%G846><s%> had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G2112><s%> immediately the leprosy <S%G3014><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was made clean. <S%G2511><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> He strictly warned <S%G1690><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G1690><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> sent <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out, <S%G1544><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "See <S%G3708><s%> you say <S%G2036><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to anybody, <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G235><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest, <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> cleansing <S%G2512><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> he went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> it much, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to spread about <S%G1310><s%> the matter, <S%G3056><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> Jesus <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%> openly <S%G5320><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a city, <S%G4172><s%> but <S%G235><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%> places: <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him from everywhere. <S%G846><s%>
